organization_management.title: Organization Management
organization_management.description: Manage your organizations and switch between different tenants
organization_management.default_update_failed: Failed to set default organization. Please try again.
organization_management.about_description: Organizations are your top-level containers for workspaces, projects, and teams. Click the checkbox icon to set an organization as your default. Click on any organization card to manage its settings (requires owner or administrator permissions).

profile_page.title: Profile Settings
profile_page.description: Manage your profile settings, preferences, and security options to customize your experience.
profile_page.auth_required_desc: Please log in to access your account settings.

profile_section.title: Profile Information
profile_section.description: Update your personal information and profile picture.
profile_section.bio_placeholder: Tell us a bit about yourself...
profile_section.profile_update_failed: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile_section.pic_update_failed: Failed to upload profile picture. Please try again.
profile_section.invalid_image: Please select a valid image file.

language_section.title: Language & Region
language_section.description: Select your preferred language for the application interface.

ai_section.title: AI Assistant Settings
ai_section.description: Configure your AI chat functionality and API settings
ai_section.enable_chat_desc: Fill all the fields to enable chat.
ai_section.footer_info: • API keys are encrypted and stored securely • Test connection after changes • The URL determines which provider is used • HTTP is allowed for localhost/private network addresses
ai_section.enter_api_key: Please enter an API key first
ai_section.enter_model: Please enter a model name first
ai_section.enter_url: Please enter an API URL first

danger_zone_section.title: Delete Account
danger_zone_section.description: Permanently delete the account and all associated data.
danger_zone_section.item_tasks: All tasks and projects will be permanently deleted
danger_zone_section.item_profile: Profile and settings will be removed
danger_zone_section.confirm_message: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All data will be lost.
danger_zone_section.delete_failed: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

password_section.title: Reset Password
password_section.description: Change your account password to keep your account secure.
password_section.failed: Failed to change password. Please try again.
password_section.requirement: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number

organization_details.title: Manage Organization
organization_details.description: Manage organization settings, members, and workflows
organization_details.access_denied_desc: You don't have permission to manage this organization. Only users with management access can view these settings.

workflow_management.title: Workflow Management
workflow_management.description: Configure task statuses and workflow transitions for your organization. These workflows will be used as templates for new projects.

workspace_settings.title: Workspace Settings
workspace_settings.description: Manage your workspace configuration and preferences
workspace_settings.name: Workspace Name
workspace_settings.slug_desc: Used in URLs. Must be unique within this organization. Only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens are allowed.
workspace_settings.access_denied: You don't have access to this workspace
workspace_settings.slug_error: Workspace slug can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens

danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.description: These actions cannot be undone. Please proceed with caution.
danger_zone.archive_desc: Archive this workspace and make it read-only
danger_zone.delete_desc: Permanently delete this workspace and all its data
